name: Förlora inte hoppet Runa
description:
Made for spelsyl6, a 2 week game jam with the theme "hopp".

Controls
Mouse. My kids played on their ipads so that works but not really optimized for touch 😅

Code, drawings and music by me.

Uses some Japanese phrases from Reitanna Seishin (https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/), thanks! <3
